*As a* developer of OData treaty group CBC services,

*I would like* to display understandable identifiers for the respective fields in the damage search or link F4 help

*So that* users of the BTP interface can work with understandable terms (refer to attached sheet - [CBC for F&E.xlsx|https://msggroup.sharepoint.com/:x:/r/sites/TEA-RI-Products/SAP%20Reinsurance%20Management%20Development/20_Product%20Definition/Supporting%20Docs/65880%20oData%20Services%20for%20TreatyGroup/F%26E%20Analysis/CBC%20for%20F%26E.xlsx?d=w516e8bc310a44af186dba66d0747860c&csf=1&web=1&e=gaiJaz] )

The aim of this story is to provide a Web API OData V4 service that returns the fixed values, including a brief description of the group category, status, reason for change.

This service is supposed to return all fields except for the change/create data.

In order to be able to call up the ODATA service, a user must have the execution authorizations for the ODATA service and also the SAP authorizations for reading Customizing data.

+Scope+

* A CBC service is available that outputs the customizing information from various fields mentioned in the sheet.
* The CBC service provides the corresponding texts of the customizing information.
* Unit tests need to be created

Notes for treaty group deletion:

* If the status of the treaty group as “posting allowed”, it cannot be deleted. Otherwise, it can be deleted.
* When group period is active, it should not allow deletion of treaties assigned in that period. It can be done at “In Progress” status.
* When the treaty group is deleted, it should be “marked for deletion” not actual delete from database.

* If the treaty assigned to the group is deleted, it should be deleted on database level also. Similar for group period as well.
* Unit tests must be created.

*As a* developer of OData treaty group CBC services,

*I would like* to display understandable identifiers for the respective fields in the damage search or link F4 help

*So that* users of the BTP interface can work with understandable terms, i.e. *group category, status, reason for change*.

*Note:* One service needs to be created for one field.

*Scope*:

The aim of this story is to provide a Web API OData V4 service that returns the fixed values, including a brief description of the group category, status, reason for change.

This service is supposed to return all fields except for the change/create data.

In order to be able to call up the ODATA service, a user must have the execution authorizations for the ODATA service and also the SAP authorizations for reading Customizing data.

The corresponding service from the TEST_MSG_RI_CBC package can be used as a template (see also External_Communication_Customizing_BasicViews.xlsx).

+Scope+

* A CBC service is available that outputs the customizing information from “group category, status, reason for change”.
* The CBC service provides the corresponding texts of the customizing information.
* Unit tests need to be created

*Notes for treaty group deletion:*

* If the status of the treaty group is “posting allowed”, it cannot be deleted. Otherwise, it can be deleted.
* When the treaty group is deleted, it should be “marked for deletion” not actual delete from database. 
* If the treaty assigned to the group is deleted, then treaty should be deleted on database level also. 
* If the group period assigned to the treaty group is deleted, then Group period should be deleted on database level also. 
* Update the History Tables 
* Unit Test class needs to be implemented
